name: iPC Health
description: You can use this app only when your hospital has a subscription to iPC Health.   iPC Health helps hospitals to address all the key challenges related to career development and training of its employees - like access to high quality NABH and induction content prepared by industry experts, maintaining of employee training records, administration and evaluation of assessments at end of trainings, real-time progress on planned trainings, and scheduling of training.  As an employee of a hospital that has a subscription to iPC Health, you will be able to complete assignments that are assigned to you, view usage statistics, and get detailed reports for any tests and exams completed. The courses are designed for engagement and present complex concepts in small easy to understand chunks. Additionally, the courses have embedded quizzes to test for comprehension. You can download the courses on to your device. Once you download a course, you can read it and complete quizzes even when you dont have internet.
